meanings.definition: The act of rubbing or pressing something against a surface.
meanings.sent1: She made rubbings of leaves on paper during art class.
meanings.sent2: He collected rubbings of ancient inscriptions from different monuments.
meanings.sent3: The detective found mysterious rubbings on the victim's diary.
meanings.sent4: The rubbings of history left imprints on the old stone tablet.
meanings.sent5: The rubbings of the coin revealed hidden details.

meanings.definition: Impressions or images created by rubbing.
meanings.sent1: The rubbings of the coin showed its intricate design.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her collection of rubbings from various textures.
meanings.sent3: The artist used rubbings of tree bark to create a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: The rubbings of the ancient manuscript were carefully preserved.
meanings.sent5: The rubbings of the fossil captured every detail of the prehistoric creature.
